name: astrakhan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the skin of very young sheep from Astrakhan in southern Russia, or a cloth that looks like this skin. It is covered in tightly curled grey or black wool that looks like fur
bigtunaonline/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
